optionalfeature.name: Added Time
entries: When you cast spare the dying on a creature, that creature can immediately expend Hit Dice up to a number of dice equal to your proficiency bonus and gain the total rolled as temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Agonizing Cantrips (Replaces Agonizing Blast)
entries: When you cast a warlock cantrip that deals damage, you may add your Charisma modifier to the damage it deals on a hit, as long as your Charisma modifier is not already applied to the damage.

optionalfeature.name: Blade Weaving
entries: When you cast sword burst, you can choose a number of creatures that you can see equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature). The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against this spell.

optionalfeature.name: Blood Offering
entries: As a bonus action, you can sacrifice half your maximum Hit Dice to regain one expended spell slot.

optionalfeature.name: Bloom of Zuggtmoy
entries: Any creature who fails their saving throw against poison spray is also poisoned until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Bounty of the Shadows
entries: You gain one additional spell slot.

optionalfeature.name: Brazen Bells
entries: Any creature who fails their saving throw against toll the dead is also feared until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Brilliant Dawn
entries: Any creature who fails their saving throw against sacred flame is also blinded until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Cacophony Caller
entries: The range of thunderclap is increased to 10 feet. Additionally, the distance the thunderous sound it causes is reduced to 50 feet, and any creature that takes damage from this spell is deafened until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Radiance
entries: Any creature that gains temporary hit points from Celestial Resistance can also immediately cure one disease or neutralize one poison affecting it.

optionalfeature.name: Crack the Whip
entries: When you cast a spell using a warlock spell slot, you can use a bonus action to compel your familiar to take the Attack action.

optionalfeature.name: Deception of Baalzebul
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on their Intelligence (Investigation) checks to see through your minor illusion cantrip.

optionalfeature.name: Defiant of the Golden Statue
entries: When you cast create bonfire, you can choose a number of creatures that you can see equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1). The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against this spell.

optionalfeature.name: Distant Delving
entries: The range of Awakened Mind increases to 90 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Eldritch-Forged Links
entries: When you cast find familiar, you can choose one of the following special forms, based on your patron.

optionalfeature.name: Eye of the Storm
entries: When you cast thunderclap, you can choose a number of creatures that you can see equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature). The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against this spell.

optionalfeature.name: Far Reach Cantrips (Replaces Eldritch Spear)
entries: When you cast a warlock cantrip with a base range of at least 10 feet, its range is doubled.

optionalfeature.name: Favored of Mephistopheles
entries: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you can regain one expended spell slot. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Feast of Failures
entries: You can use Entropic Ward a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus. When you finish a long rest, you regain all expended uses.

optionalfeature.name: Feed the Flames
entries: When using Fiendish Resilience, you can choose a second damage type to become resistant to. Additionally, when you take damage of the type you are resistant to, you can use your reaction to gain a bonus to all damage you deal of that type equal to your proficiency bonus. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Forge of Dispater
entries: When a foe strikes you while blade ward is active they take fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Fury of Zariel
entries: When you make an attack with advantage while under the effects of true strike, you can reroll one of the dice once. If you score a critical hit with this attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Goliath Slayer
entries: If you roll a 6 when rolling damage for a pebble created by magic stone, the target is knocked prone.

optionalfeature.name: Grasp of Levistus
entries: A creature damaged by frostbite cannot take reactions until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Green Flame Inferno
entries: The green fire created by green-flame blade can leap, within range, up to a number of targets equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature).

optionalfeature.name: Grin at the Reaper
entries: You can use Defy Death a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus. When you finish a long rest, you regain all expended uses.

optionalfeature.name: Guard of Bael
entries: As a reaction when you are attacked, you can choose to cast blade ward. When blade ward is cast in this way its duration is instantaneous. You can use blade ward in this way a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. When you finish a short or long rest, you regain all expended uses.

optionalfeature.name: Guarded Dawn
entries: Creatures outside the radius of light cannot see the light given off by the spell, and creatures within the radius can see through the dim light beyond as if it were bright light.

optionalfeature.name: Guiding Dawn
entries: All creatures within the radius of light may add an additional 1d4 to any skill checks they make.

optionalfeature.name: Hardness of Mohs
entries: The damage of a pebble created by magic stone increases to 2d6. This damage increases to 3d6 when you reach 14th level.

optionalfeature.name: Haunting Visage
entries: The abilities of this feature also apply to the fear condition.

optionalfeature.name: Hunger of Orcus
entries: When you damage a hostile creature with chill touch, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Kiss of Juiblex
entries: You can choose to have poison spray deal acid damage rather than poison damage. When a target takes acid damage from this cantrip it takes a cumulative -1 penalty to its Armor Class, up to a maximum penalty equal to your proficiency bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Lingering Dawn
entries: Foes who make their saving throw against sacred flame take half damage instead of no damage.

optionalfeature.name: One of the Damned
entries: Undead have disadvantage on their Wisdom save required to attack you and the duration of the immunity granted on a successful save is reduced to 12 hours.

optionalfeature.name: Patronal Affinity
entries: Upon completing a long rest, you can choose one of the expanded spells granted by your patron. You can cast this spell once without expending a spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Patronal Petition
entries: Choose two of the expanded spells granted by your patron of a level that you can cast. You learn these spells. When you gain a level in this class, you can choose to replace these spells with other spells from your expanded spell list.

optionalfeature.name: Pillaged From the Grave
entries: When you succeed at a death saving throw, you can regain one expended spell slot. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Psionic Paragon
entries: After resistance is calculated, you can subtract your Charisma modifier from any psychic damage you take. However, any creature who deals psychic damage to you takes the damage dealt before resistance and the Charisma modifier reduction are applied.

optionalfeature.name: Pyrokinetic
entries: Create bonfire no longer requires concentration. However, you can only have a number of bonfires active equal to half your proficiency bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Reaping of the Dead
entries: If you reduce a hostile creature's hit points to 0 using toll the dead you regain one expended Hit Die. If you already have maximum Hit Dice you can expend one of them and gain that amount of temporary hit points.

optionalfeature.name: Resonating Strike
entries: When you successfully hit a target with booming blade, any attacks of opportunity the target makes against you are made at disadvantage until the end of your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Ride the Lightning
entries: The range and pull distance of lightning lure are doubled.

optionalfeature.name: Rolling Thunder
entries: If you can take multiple attacks using the Attack action, when you cast booming blade you can, as a bonus action, make one additional melee weapon attack against the target.

optionalfeature.name: Scent of Fierna
entries: The duration of friends is increased to 10 minutes and no longer requires concentration.

optionalfeature.name: Scion of the Tel'Quessir
entries: You can choose to have the duration of the charm or fear effect be increased to a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus. At the end of each of its turns, a creature affected by Scion of the Tel'Quessir can make a Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

optionalfeature.name: Silver Tongue of Graz'zt
entries: While under the effects of friends, you gain proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion skills. If you are already proficient in these skills, the proficiency bonus is doubled if it is not already doubled from another source.

optionalfeature.name: Smoldering Soul
entries: You gain resistance to fire damage. Additionally, whenever a creature hits you with a melee weapon attack, that creature takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier if you are not incapacitated.

optionalfeature.name: Spell Shakes
entries: The disadvantage caused by frostbite also effects spell attack rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Step of the Darkling
entries: You can use Misty Escape a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus. When you finish a long rest, you regain all expended uses.

optionalfeature.name: Stoke the Forge
entries: If you are able to take multiple attacks using the Attack action, when you cast green-flame blade you can, as a bonus action, make one additional melee weapon attack against the target.

optionalfeature.name: Swarm Overwhelming
entries: The first 5 feet of movement forced by infestation provoke attacks of opportunity.

optionalfeature.name: Swell of the Styx
entries: When you damage a creature with chill touch, it, and all creatures of your choice within 10 feet of it, cannot regain hit points until the start of your next turn. You can use chill touch in this way a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. When you finish a short or long rest, you regain all expended uses.

optionalfeature.name: Tempered Steel
entries: Instead of a 5 foot radius, you can choose to cast sword burst in a 10-foot cone or a 15-foot line.

optionalfeature.name: Twice Struck
entries: If you pull the target of lightning lure within 5 feet of you, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Twisted of Fate
entries: You can use Dark One's Own Luck a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus. When you finish a long rest, you regain all expended uses.

optionalfeature.name: Unending Glory
entries: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a Healing Light die, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

optionalfeature.name: Vermin Shuffle
entries: A creature damaged by infestation must move up to half its speed in a random direction if it can move.
